summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Medical Association Website. All core functionality working correctly including public access, admin authentication, CRUD operations, and frontend-backend integration.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for successful creation
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works but doesn't follow REST conventions
None - this is actually correct implementation

resolved_issues.issue: Initially appeared to fail but was due to using incorrect doctor IDs in testing
resolved_issues.resolution: Delete functionality works correctly when proper ID is used

minor_issues.issue: May not handle 404 responses gracefully when doctor ID doesn't exist
minor_issues.impact: Could show success message even when delete fails due to wrong ID

design_feedback.feedback: Clean, professional medical website design with proper contrast and spacing
Excellent implementation of data-testid attributes for automated testing

passed_tests: Home page loads with 'Find a Doctor' button
Doctor appears in directory after creation
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding better error handling in frontend for delete operations to show appropriate messages when doctor ID doesn't exist (404 responses). Also consider changing POST /api/doctors to return 201 status code for REST compliance.

success_percentage.backend: 95% - All core functionality working, minor status code issue
success_percentage.frontend: 98% - Excellent UI/UX, minor error handling improvement needed
